original: Bendz, Kerstin, fru, Jönköping, f. 7/7/82 i Malmö av v. här:hövd. Per Bendz o. Ninna Bursie. G. 10 m. presid. i Göta hovr. Gunnar Bendz. Barn: se denne. — Ordf. i Jönköp.-krets, av SvRK sed. 30, led. av styr. f. Jönköp.-distr. av SvRK sed. 31, led. av Fredrika Bremerförb. förb:styr. sed. 39, ordf. i dess Jönköp.-krets 30-36, 45-47, därefter hed :ordf., ordf. i dess sjuksköt :byrå 31-36, ordf. i Allm. hjälpfören. i Jönköp. 38-46. SvRKSM.
translated: Bendz, Kerstin, Mrs., Jönköping, born on July 7th, 1882 in Malmö, daughter of Lieutenant Colonel Per Bendz and Ninna Bursie. Married in 1910 to the President in the Göta Court of Appeal, Gunnar Bendz. Children: see him. — Chairman in the Jönköping district of the Swedish Red Cross since 1930, member of the board of the Jönköping district of the Swedish Red Cross since 1931, member of the board of the Fredrika Bremer Association national board since 1939, chairman of its Jönköping district from 1930-1936, 1945-1947, thereafter honorary chairman. Chairman of the association's nursing bureau in Jönköping from 1931-1936, chairman of the General Assistance Society in Jönköping from 1938-1946. Knight of the Swedish Red Cross Star of Merit.

structured.name: Kerstin Bendz

spouse.name: Gunnar Bendz
spouse.jobTitle: President in the Göta Court of Appeal

structured.description: Knight of the Swedish Red Cross Star of Merit.
